title: Ultra Penthouse Lux Living Downtown Union Station
neighborhood: Downtown Union Station RiNo LoDo Highlands LoHi
posting_body: Residence 1001 is a contemporary, two-bedroom 2,090 square foot penthouse unit with elegant wide-plank Walnut hardwood floors, 12 foot ceilings, and sweeping views of the Denver skyline.
The unit has an expansive floor plan with a large foyer, complete with entry closet, powder room, and pantry closet.
The chef-inspired kitchen features custom Linnea Quattro cabinetry, and two ovens.
A Viking gas range and refrigerator allows for easy entertaining.
Key features of the living and dining area include a luxurious Karnezi marble gas fireplace and floor- to-ceiling windows.
This opulent penthouse residence boasts a 480-square-foot private terrace allowing for easy outdoor entertaining.
The primary suite includes a 118 sq.
ft private balcony overlooking 16th Street, two spacious walk-in closets, and a grand ensuite bathroom with a double sink vanity and enticing soaking tub.
A walk-in closet in the secondary bedroom and a 3/4 bathroom across the hall allow for effortless living.
Two reserved parking spaces are available.
